item.name: Alarming Hourglass
entries: This sand-filled hourglass has a dial at the top with settings between 1 minute and 1 hour. You can use an action to set the time and turn over the hourglass. A mental alarm alerts you with a ping in your mind if you are within 1 mile of the hourglass when the time runs out.

item.name: Alchemist's Loupe
entries: This small jeweler's eyepiece has 3 charges. While looking through it, you can use an action to expend one of its charges and detect transmutation magic for 10 minutes.
While this effect is active, objects affected by transmutation magic are outlined in a faint aura when viewed through the loupe.
The loupe regains {@dice 1d3} charged daily at dawn.

item.name: Arcane Locket
entries: While holding this locket, you can speak its command word as a bonus action to cause it to open. A creature can attempt to open the locket without speaking the command word by using an action to make a DC 18 Strength check.
On a success, the locket breaks open and becomes nonmagical.

item.name: Beetle Buzzer
entries: This small metal beetle has spindly legs and a wind-up key on its back. While holding the beetle, you can use an action to wind it up and set it down. When you do so, the beetle walks 30 feet in the direction it was pointing when activated and emits loud noises for 1 minute, audible from as far away as 300 feet.

item.name: Berry of the Birdwatcher
entries: You can use an action to hold this berry out to a bird you can see within 30 feet of you. If the bird is willing, it can eat the berry and become your eyes and ears for 10 minutes or until you use an action to shake your head and end this effect. During this time, you are deaf and blind in your own senses.
While the bird is within 100 feet of you, you can telepathically communicate with it, telling it where to go and what to do.

item.name: Big Boy Pants
entries: While wearing these pants, you can speak a command word as an action to make your appearance double in all dimensions for 10 minutes. This change is illusory, and your new form has no substance.
A creature that uses its action to examine your form can determine that it is an illusion with a successful DC 12 Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) check.
Once you have used this property, it can't be used again until the next dawn

item.name: Bloodied Robes
entries: While wearing these white robes, if your hit points drop below half your maximum (rounded down), dark red splotches appear across the fabric. This effect lasts until your hit points rise above half your maximum. You can use a bonus action to suppress the effect for 1 hour

item.name: Boots of Firm Footing
entries: While wearing these boots, you can't be pushed by nonmagical moving water while you have at least one foot on the ground

item.name: Bouquet of the Grave
entries: If you place this bouquet of flowers over the buried body of a dead creature and leave it there for 24 hours, the bouquet becomes magically linked to the body. If the body is moved, the creature becomes undead, or the creature is returned to life, the flowers instantly wither away, and the bouquet becomes nonmagical.
If {@spell dispel magic} is cast on the body, the effect ends, and the bouquet becomes nonmagical, wilting as normal.

item.name: Bracelets of Captivity
entries: While holding these bracelets, you can use an action to speak a command word and turn them into a set of manacles. Speaking a second command word as an action turns the manacles back into a pair of bracelets.
You can use an action to change the command words.
Doing so requires you to touch the bracelets together, followed by speaking the two new command words.

item.name: Breath Mint of Mimicry
entries: While sucking on this breath mint, you can mimic the speech of another person for 1 hour. You must have heard the person speaking for at least 1 minute.

item.name: Brooch of Buoyancy
entries: While wearing this brooch underwater, you can use a bonus action to twist it and cause it to become a large air bladder. The bladder brings you to the surface at a rate of 60 feet per round. The air bladder turns back into a brooch when you reach the surface, or when you use a bonus action to pop it and end the effect.

item.name: Carpal Candle
entries: This candle is affixed to the skeletal hand of a dead necromancer. You can use an action to light the candle.
The candle sheds {@quickref Vision and Light||2} in a 5-foot radius, and {@quickref Vision and Light||2} for an additional 5 feet. The light lasts 1 hour and is only visible to you.
Once you have used this property, it can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Chain of Command
entries: While holding this short length of chain, you can use an action to cast the {@spell animal friendship} spell (save DC 13). If the creature fails its save and its size is larger than yours, you can mount the creature. The chain becomes a bridle that extends to fit the mouth of the creature and mounting it doesn't cost you any movement.
Once you have used this property, it can't be used again until you finish a long rest.

item.name: Chain of Expansion
entries: While holding this simple silver necklace, you can speak its command word as an action to cause it to turn into a
10-foot chain. You can speak the command word again to turn the chain back into a necklace.

item.name: Chained Lantern
entries: This hooded lantern is affixed to the end of a 10-foot chain.

While lit, it burns for 6 hours on 1 pint of oil, shedding {@quickref Vision and Light||2} in a 30-foot radius and {@quickref Vision and Light||2} for an additional 30 feet. You can use an action to lower the hood, reducing the light to {@quickref Vision and Light||2} in a 5-foot radius.

If you hold one end of the chain and use an action to speak the command word, the chain animates. As a bonus action, you can command the other end to move toward a destination you choose or cause the chain to stiffen and move with you.

item.name: Chalice of Incense
entries: This chalice has six buttons around the base. You can use an action to press one of the buttons and cause the chalice to produce fragrant smoke. You can choose between vanilla, jasmine, lavender, frankincense, sandalwood, and cinnamon. The scent fills a 30-foot radius, originating from the chalice.
You can use an action to press the button again and cause the chalice to stop producing smoke.

item.name: Chameleon Candy
entries: This small leather pouch contains 3 pieces of hard candy.
When eaten by a creature, the candy tastes like that creature's favorite food. The candy disappears 1 hour after being removed from the pouch.
The pouch replaces any candy that has been removed from it daily at dawn.

item.name: Cloak of Stiffness
entries: While you wear this cloak, it does not billow in the wind.

item.name: Collapsible Ladder
entries: While holding this 5-foot ladder, you can use an action to speak a command word and cause it to become up to 10 feet long. The ladder can only elongate as far as the surrounding space allows. You can speak a second command word as an action to cause the ladder to revert to 5 feet long.

item.name: Concealable Cutlery
entries: This item appears to be a piece of simple silver cutlery, stored in a leather case. Different types of concealable cutlery exist, each with a different effect. The DM chooses the kind of cutlery or determines it randomly.

entries.name: Butter Knife
entries: While you are holding the butter knife, you can speak its command word as a bonus action to cause it to turn into a torch for 1 hour or until you use an action to return it to its case and end this effect. Once you have used this property, it can't be used again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Dessert Fork
entries: While you are holding the dessert fork, you can speak its command word as a bonus action to cause it to turn into a crowbar for 1 hour or until you use an action to return it to its case and end this effect. Once you have used this property, it can't be used again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Salad Fork
entries: While you are holding the salad fork, you can speak its command word as a bonus action to cause it to turn into a trident for 1 hour or until you use an action to return it to its case and end this effect. Once you have used this property, it can't be used again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Soup Spoon
entries: While you are holding the soup spoon, you can speak its command word as a bonus action to cause it to turn into a shield for 1 hour or until you use an action to return it to its case and end this effect. Once you have used this property, it can't be used again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Steak Knife
entries: While you are holding the steak knife, you can speak its command word as a bonus action to cause it to turn into a longsword for 1 hour or until you use an action to return it to its case and end this effect. Once you have used this property, it can't be used again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Tea Spoon
entries: While you are holding the tea spoon, you can speak its command word as a bonus action to cause it to turn into a shovel for 1 hour or until you use an action to return it to its case and end this effect. Once you have used this property, it can't be used again until the next dawn.

Concealable cutlery can be found individually or in complete sets. A utility set contains a butter knife, a dessert fork, and a tea spoon. A warfare set contains a salad fork, a soup spoon, and a steak knife.

item.name: Conch of the Merfolk
entries: You can use an action to hold this conch to your ear and gain the ability to understand and speak with fish for 10 minutes. You learn about the fish's experiences over the last day, as well as local places and creatures.
If your DM allows, the fish may also complete a small task for you, if you can successfully convince it to do so.
Once you have used this property, it can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Cozy Scarf
entries: While wearing this scarf, you have advantage on Constitution saving throws made to resist the effects of cold weather.

item.name: Dagger of the Nightwalker
entries: This ebony dagger doesn't make noise when it hits or cuts something

item.name: Defiant Dominoes
entries: This set of dominoes comes with one-hundred white pieces and one black piece. The dominoes can be placed on any surface, even vertical walls and ceilings, and will stay upright until removed or knocked over by another domino.
You can speak the set's command word as an action to cause the black piece to fall over, triggering a chain reaction that knocks over any dominoes arranged in a row

item.name: Duplikey
entries: While holding this sturdy brass key, you can use an action to tap it against another key and cause the duplikey to become an identical copy of it. Once you have used this property, the duplikey becomes nonmagical.

item.name: Dust of Luminescence
entries: This small packet contains 3 pinches of glowing dust. You can use an action to take a pinch of dust and sprinkle it in a cup of water, causing it to glow with golden light for 1 hour. The water emits {@quickref Vision and Light||2} in a 5-foot radius and {@quickref Vision and Light||2} for an additional 5 feet.

If you drink the water before it stops glowing, your body glows with the same golden light for the remainder of the hour, emitting {@quickref Vision and Light||2} in a 10-foot radius and {@quickref Vision and Light||2} for an additional 10 feet.

item.name: Eavesdropper's Earrings
entries: While wearing these earrings, you have advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks made to overhear conversations held within 30 feet of you.

item.name: Gibbering Skull
entries: This human skull has two crystal eyes, one red and one blue. While holding the skull, you can use an action to press the red eye and cause the skull to remember everything it heard in the last minute.
Thereafter, you can use an action to press the blue eye and cause it to repeat everything it heard in that minute, mimicking the sounds it heard and the voices of any creature that spoke.

item.name: Glasses of Far Sight
entries: While wearing these glasses, you can use an action to twist a knob and cause everything seen through them to be magnified to twice their size. You can use an action to twist the knob again and end this effect.

item.name: Glove of Holding
entries: While wearing this glove, you can use an action to hold out your hand toward a humanoid you can see within 30 feet of you. The target must succeed on a DC 10 Charisma saving throw. On a failure, the target is forced to shake your hand and is {@condition grappled} for 1 minute. The target automatically succeeds the saving throw if you are fighting it, and the effect ends early if someone in your party harms it.
Once you have used this property, it can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Gloves of the Arsonist
entries: While wearing these gloves, you can use a bonus action to snap your fingers and cause a 3-inch jet of flame to shoot out from your thumb. The flame sheds {@quickref Vision and Light||2} in a 10- foot radius and {@quickref Vision and Light||2} for an additional 10 feet.
The flame can ignite combustible materials and persists until you use your action to snap your fingers and end this effect.

item.name: Hair Pin of Sight
entries: This silver hair pin has a bright sapphire eye set into its center. While holding it, you can use an action to see through the eye until you move more than 10 feet away from the hair pin or you use an action to end this effect.

item.name: Hair Pin of the Student
entries: This hair pin has a bronze peacock at the head. While wearing it, you are proficient with improvised weapons and quarterstaffs.

item.name: Hand Mirror of Retrospection
entries: While holding this silver hand mirror, you can use a bonus action to press a button on its side to cause it to record everything reflected on its surface for the next minute.
Thereafter, you can use a bonus action to press a second button and cause the mirror to replay everything it captured.
Once the events have played, the mirror forgets what it recorded.

item.name: Hat of Circling Birds
entries: When you drop to 0 hit points while wearing this hat, it conjures three small birds that chirp while circling your head. Each time you fail a death saving throw, one of the birds disappears. If you are stabilized, the remaining birds turn into flower blossoms and fall to the ground.

item.name: Hat of Gloom
entries: While wearing this hat, you can use a bonus action to cause it to summon a small illusory raincloud above your head for 1 minute. The illusion creates the image and sound of pouring rain, accompanied by thunder and lightning.

item.name: Hat of Many Forms
entries: While wearing this hat, you can use a bonus action to change the style, color, and apparent quality of the material. The weight of the hat doesn't change and when removed, the hat becomes a plain, brown cap.

item.name: Hat of Rain Bane
entries: While wearing this hat, falling rain is repelled in a 5-foot radius, centered on yourself. Water on the ground is not affected, and the hat cannot repel snow, hail, or torrential rain.

item.name: Hat of the Horseman
entries: While wearing this brightly colored hat, you can speak its command word as an action and cause both the hat and your head to become {@condition invisible} until the hat is removed. You don't gain any of the benefits from the {@condition invisible} condition.

item.name: Helm of Scholarship
entries: While wearing this delicate metal helm, you gain the following benefits:

items: You can read twice as fast as normal. If you are a wizard, this doesn't affect the time you must spend to copy a spell into your spellbook.
You have advantage on Charisma ({@skill Persuasion}) checks to gain access to library archives.

item.name: Heward's Handy Coin Vault
entries: This small, spring-loaded metal tube attaches to a belt.

The interior of the tube is an extradimensional space that can hold a up to 500 total pieces of platinum, gold, electrum, silver, and copper coins. The vault weighs ½ pound, regardless of its contents.

While wearing or holding the vault, you can use an action to speak an amount you wish to draw from the vault and press the lever on its side. If the vault contains at least that many coins, it dispenses them.
Placing the coin vault inside an extradimensional space created by a {@item bag of holding}, {@item portable hole}, or similar item instantly destroys both items and opens a gate to the

entries.name: Astral Plane
entries: The gate originates where the one item was placed inside the other. Any creature within 10 feet of the gate is sucked through it and deposited in a random location on the Astral Plane. The gate then closes. The gate is one-way only and can't be reopened.

item.name: Heward's Handy Sandbag
entries: This small leather pouch appears empty, though sifting sand can be heard from within when shaken. While holding the sandbag, you can use an action to turn over the pouch and cause up to 1 pound of sand to pour from it.
Once a total of 1 pound of sand has been produced, the magic ceases to function until the next dawn.

item.name: Holy Greatsword
entries: paladin)
The blade of this sword appears to be a stained-glass depiction of sacred events. The sword can be used as a spellcasting focus for your paladin spells.

item.name: Hood of the Elderly
entries: While wearing this cloak, you can use an action to pull up the hood and magically appear as an elderly version of yourself for 1 hour or until you lower the hood.
Once you have used this property, it can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Inked Bracers
entries: When you wear these bracers, they become the color of your skin and are indiscernible from the rest of your arms.
While wearing them, you can use an action to cause tattoos to appear on their surface. You choose the appearance of the tattoos. When you remove the bracers, their surfaces are wiped clean.

item.name: Joy Glove
entries: This leather glove has metal bands that circle the fingers and palm. The glove has 2 charges. While wearing it, you can use an action to expend a charge and cast the {@spell shocking grasp} spell from it. You make the spell's attack with an attack bonus of +3. The glove regains all expended charges daily at dawn.

item.name: Key of the Keeper
entries: The teeth of this small brass key constantly change shape.
You can use an action to insert it into any lock and lock it.
Once you have used the key, it can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Leash of Lashing
entries: This item is composed of a set of two metal hooks. While the hooks are within 30 feet of one another, you can use an action to speak a command word and cause a rope made of light to appear, linking the hooks in the most direct route. The rope has the same statistics as silk rope and cannot change length once summoned.
The rope lasts for 1 hour or until you use a sharp blade to cut it.

item.name: Lighthouse Lantern
entries: When affixed to the mast of a ship, this lantern flashes red when the ship comes within 120 feet of land or rocks that break the water's surface. The lantern can be seen from 60 feet away but produces no light to see by.

item.name: Lipstick of the Fickle
entries: This lipstick takes 1 minute to apply and lasts 24 hours.
While wearing it, your lips change color once every hour.
Roll a {@dice d6} and consult the chart.
Each stick has enough for 10 applications.

item.name: Map of Destination
entries: This map depicts the geography of a 100-mile square. You can use an action to point at two spots on the map and cause it to display the shortest, most direct physical route between the points with a red line. The map then becomes nonmagical, but the line remains.

item.name: Map of Location
entries: This map depicts the geography of a 100-mile square. You can use an action to speak a command word and have your current location appear on the map as a red dot that persists for 1 minute. Once you have used this property, it can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Map of Revelation
entries: This map initially appears to be a blank parchment, rolled and sealed with wax. You can use an action to break the seal and unroll the map. When you do so, the surrounding geography in a 10-mile radius appears in the middle of the map. As you move, the map continues to fill out the area in a 10-mile radius, centered on itself. The map has enough space to fill a 100-mile square.

item.name: Mask of the Monster
entries: This mask resembles the face of a monstrous humanoid.

You can use an action to place the mask on your face and take on the guise of the depicted monster as if you had cast the {@spell disguise self} spell ({@skill Investigation} DC 10). The effect ends early if you remove the mask. The DM chooses the kind of mask or determines it randomly.
Once you have used the mask, it can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Miniature Mimic
entries: This small chest can hold up to 1 cubic foot of material.

You can use an action to speak a command word and cause the chest to open. If you attempt to open the chest without first speaking the command word, the chest grows teeth and you must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or take {@damage 1d4 + 1} piercing damage, as it attempts to bite your hand.

item.name: Mug of Clear Water
entries: Any nonmagical liquid poured into this cup is magically transformed into clean water

item.name: Nail Paints of Marking
entries: This small glass bottle contains enough paint for one application. Applying the paint takes 10 minutes and the paint lasts 10 days. While your nails are painted, scratching them on any surface leaves behind a trail of color that lasts for 24 hours.

item.name: Parchment of Imitation
entries: This item is a sheet of parchment with a magical sigil in the center. You can use your action to press it against another sheet of parchment and speak a command word to cause it to become an identical copy of that parchment. It copies any writing and stains but doesn't duplicate magical effects. Once you have used this property, the parchment of imitation becomes nonmagical.

item.name: Pearl of Illusions
entries: This small bead is filled with swirling, purple smoke. You can use an action to throw the bead at a point you can see within 30 feet of you. When it hits a surface, you create the image of an object that is no larger than a 5-foot cube, centered on the pearl. The image can't create any sensory effects. Physical interaction with the image reveals it to be an illusion.
A creature can use its action to make a DC 10 Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) check on the illusion. If it discerns the illusion for what it is, the illusion becomes faint to it.
The image lasts for 1 hour, until you move more than 30 feet away from the pearl, or until the pearl is picked up.
Once you have used the pearl, it can't be used again until you finish a long rest.

item.name: Pigeon Pointer
entries: This small pigeon figurine can balance perfectly on its beak. While the pigeon is balanced on your finger, you can speak its command word as an action to cause it to point north until it is removed from your finger

item.name: Perpetual Ink Pen
entries: This elegant quill pen magically supplies its own ink. You can use an action to speak the name of a color and cause the ink in the pen to change color.

item.name: Pop-up Tent
entries: This object appears as a tightly rolled bundle of canvas that measures 1 foot long and 6 inches in diameter. You can speak its command word as an action to cause the bundle to unroll and assemble into a tent that sleeps up to two medium creatures.

Speaking the command word again causes the tent to roll back into a bundle, provided that no creatures are inside. Any objects inside the tent when it collapses are ejected and remain outside the tent as it folds.

item.name: Pot of Purity
entries: When you cook food in this large metal pot, it is purified as if you had cast the {@spell purify food and drink} spell.
Once the pot has purified enough food to feed six creatures, its magic ceases to function until the next dawn

item.name: Prismatic Paint
entries: This small pot holds 1 pint of paint. While holding the pot, you can use an action and speak the name of a color to cause the paint inside to become that color.
The pot refills with fresh paint daily at dawn.

item.name: Retuning Fork
entries: While holding this tuning fork, you can use an action to tap it against an instrument and cause it to be instantly tuned.

item.name: Ring of the Hunter
entries: This ring has 3 charges. While wearing it, you can use an action to expend a charge conjure a translucent, purple shortbow into your hand for 1 minute. The bow conjures a nocked arrow when you draw the bowstring. The arrows disappear when they strike something, or when the bow disappears.
If you drop the bow, it disappears early. The ring regains all expended charges daily at dawn.

item.name: Ring of the Tiger
entries: While wearing this ring, you can use a bonus action to conjure metal claws from your fist for 1 minute. Your unarmed strikes deal slashing damage for the duration, and your attacks become magical if they aren't alread

item.name: Sarong of Drying
entries: While wearing this sarong, your clothes remain dry even while underwater.

item.name: Shadow Dagger
entries: When thrown, this curved obsidian dagger vanishes in a puff of dark smoke, becoming {@condition invisible}. When it strikes a surface, the dagger reappears in a puff of smoke, becoming visible.

item.name: Singing Sword
entries: This thin rapier can be used as the bow for a stringed instrument, such as a fiddle or a {@item viol|PHB}. When you hit a creature with it, you can use a bonus action to cause it to play music for 1 minute.

item.name: Sleep-tight Bathing Salts
entries: This small cloth pouch contains enough fragrant salt for a single bath. You can use an action to sprinkle the salts into a tub of hot water, consuming them. If you soak in the water for 1 hour, the next long rest you begin within 1 hour only takes you 4 hours to finish. Only one creature can benefit from this effect.

item.name: Slithering Hook
entries: This grappling hook is affixed to a 60-foot-long silk rope.
When the hook is thrown, the rope animates to help affix the hook. You have advantage on Strength and Dexterity checks made to throw the hook.

item.name: Smuggler's Chair
entries: This item appears to be a simple wooden chair, but close inspection reveals a hidden compartment when the seat is lifted. The hidden compartment fills the space between the chair legs and is concealed by an illusion that makes it appear empty. The compartment has a volume of 1 cubic foot.
A creature that uses its action to examine the chair can determine that it is an illusion with a successful DC 13
{@skill Investigation} check.

item.name: Spectacles of Recollection
entries: While wearing these glasses, you can use an action to perfectly recall anything you have seen during a 5-minute period within the past month.
Once you have used this property, it can't be used again until you finish a long rest.

item.name: Staff of Moons
entries: This staff has a glowing orb set into the top that sheds colored light, creating {@quickref Vision and Light||2} in a 10-foot radius and {@quickref Vision and Light||2} for an additional 10 feet. While holding it, you can use a bonus action to change the color of the light.
While holding the staff, you can also use an action to suppress the light of the staff or cause it to glow.

item.name: Staff of Spores
entries: This staff has a large flower set into the top. While holding the staff, you can use an action to cast the {@spell dancing lights} spell from it at will. When you do this, the flower opens until the spell ends, revealing faintly luminescent petals.

item.name: Stellar Spectacles
entries: When looking through these spectacles, the constellations in the night sky are outlined in white lines. While wearing the spectacles, you have advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Survival}) checks to navigate using the stars.

item.name: Still-beating Heart
entries: This shrunken heart was taken from the body of a troll and imbued with dark magic. If you fail a death saving throw while the heart is in your possession, it becomes a success instead. Once you have used the heart, it crumbles into ashes and is destroyed.

item.name: Thieves' Blade
entries: While holding this dagger, you can speak its command word as an action to cause it to transform into a set of {@item thieves' tools|PHB}, linked by a thin, silver chain. You can use an action to speak its command word again and cause it to transform back into a dagger.

item.name: Tippity Tap Shoes
entries: These pink shoes are made from fine silk and have white laces tied in an intricate fashion. While wearing the shoes, you have advantage on Charisma ({@skill Performance}) checks made to dance.

item.name: True-seeking Dart
entries: You can use an action to throw this dart at a creature or object you can see within 60 feet of you. The dart strikes its target unerringly. If the target is a creature, it takes
{@damage 1d4 + 1} piercing damage and the dart becomes nonmagical.

item.name: Un-breakable Teapot
entries: This delicate porcelain teapot is painted with intricate flowers and gold leafing. If the teapot is broken, you can speak its command word as an action to cause the teapot to magically repair itself. If any pieces are missing, the teapot is repaired with a hole where the piece used to be.

item.name: Unending Scroll
entries: This scroll is mounted inside a folding scroll case. When opened, the scroll measures 1 foot across. The scroll is of infinite length and can be turned inside its case to reveal more parchment.
If the scroll case is broken, the scroll crumbles into ashes and is destroyed.

item.name: Wand of Bubbles
entries: This wand has 7 charges for the following properties. It regains {@dice 1d6 + 1} charges daily at dawn. If you expend the wand's last charge, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 1, the wand bursts into a shower of bubbles and is destroyed.

entries.name: Colorful
entries: While holding the wand, you can use an action to expend a charge and create a 1-foot sphere bubble in the color of your choice.

entries.name: Shaped
entries: While holding the wand, you can use an action to expend a charge and create a bubble in the shape of an object you have seen. The bubble can be no larger than 3 feet on a side.

entries.name: Shower
entries: While holding the wand, you can use an action to expend a charge and cause a shower of small bubbles to erupt from the end of the wand until the end of your next turn.

item.name: Wand of Colors
entries: This wand has 7 charges. While holding it, you can use an action to expend 1 of its charges and cause one object you can see within 30 feet of you to become the color of your choice. The object must be no larger than a 5-foot cube.
This change lasts 1 hour.
The wand regains {@dice 1d6 + 1} expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the wand's last charge, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 1, the wand erupts in a harmless, multicolored flash and is destroyed.

item.name: Wand of Subtitles
entries: This wand has 3 charges. While holding it, you can use an action to expend one of its charges and cause subtitles to appear in front of a creature you can see within 30 feet of you for 10 minutes. Each wand can translate one language into Common. The DM chooses the kind of wand or determines it randomly.
The wand regains all expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the wand's last charge, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 1, the wand crumbles into ashes and is destroyed.

item.name: Wand of Swaying
entries: This wand has 7 charges. While holding it, you can use an action to expend one of its charges and cause plants in a
30-foot radius, centered on yourself, to sway as if in the wind.
The wand regains {@dice 1d6 + 1} expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the wand's last charge, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 1, the wand crumbles into ashes and is destroyed.

item.name: Wand of the Magician
entries: This wand has 3 charges. While holding it, you can use an action to expend one of its charges and transform the wand into a bouquet of flowers of your choice. After 1 minute, the flowers turn back into a wand.

The wand regains all charges daily at dawn. If you expend the wand's last charge, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 1, a cooing dove can be heard as the wand bursts into a handful of white feathers and is destroyed.

item.name: white feathers and is destroyed.
entries: Wondrous item, common

This wax seal is carved with arcane sigils. When used to seal a letter, that letter cannot be opened by anyone but the addressed recipient, as if you had cast the {@spell arcane lock} spell on it. Once you have used the seal, it can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Whistle of the Stallion
entries: This ceramic whistle is shaped like a galloping horse.

While holding it, you can use an action to blow the whistle and summon a riding horse at a point you can see within 10 feet of you that lasts for 1 hour. Once you have used the whistle, it can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Wind-up Beacon
entries: This item appears to be a small brass dome with a winding key on the side. You can use an action to turn the key and set the beacon on the ground. When you do so, the beacon emits a 100-foot tall pillar of light for 10 minutes, or until the beacon is moved.
The base of the beacon emits {@quickref Vision and Light||2} in a 20-foot radius, and {@quickref Vision and Light||2} for an additional 20 feet. The pillar of light can be seen from up to 1 mile away
